importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: Kada Scott was last seen at her workplace on this date, marking the beginning of her disappearance and triggering the investigation into her fate.
A breakthrough occurred on this day with the discovery of human remains and the arrest of suspect Keon King, leading to significant developments in the case.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The two-week period between Scott’s disappearance and the discovery of human remains represents a critical investigative window where key developments, including the tip leading to the grave and the arrest of King, occurred.

keyTakeAways: Human remains of an unidentified female were found in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school in Philadelphia.
The remains are under investigation to determine if they belong to Kada Scott, a 23-year-old woman who vanished on October 4, 2025.
Keon King, a 21-year-old man, was arrested and charged with Scott’s kidnapping, as well as a prior kidnapping case involving a woman he allegedly assaulted earlier this year.
King is believed to be the last person in contact with Kada Scott before she went offline, and tracking of his phone communications led investigators to him.
A specific anonymous tip led police to the shallow grave, where the remains were discovered overnight and removed by late afternoon.
Prior to the grave discovery, police found at least two of Scott’s belongings near the abandoned school but did not locate her body.
Investigators are examining a gold 1999 Toyota Camry believed to be linked to King, which was located in a parking lot after a public tip.
King faced charges in a prior case involving domestic kidnapping and assault, with charges withdrawn in May due to a witness failure to appear and now being refiled.
Video evidence from the prior case is set for presentation at a preliminary hearing.
Authorities are investigating the nature and duration of the relationship between Scott and King, noting they had a short-term connection.
Police believe all leads point to King, and are also exploring whether other individuals were involved.
The Philadelphia Police Department and FBI’s Violent Crime Task Force are jointly investigating the case.
The family of Kada Scott, especially her mother and father, has expressed deep anguish and has urged the public to come forward with any information.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Two weeks after 23-year-old Kada Scott went missing in Philadelphia, human remains of an unidentified female were discovered in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school. Police believe the remains may belong to Scott, and suspect Keon King, a 21-year-old man with prior kidnapping charges, is central to the case. King was identified through phone tracking and is charged with Scott’s kidnapping, as well as a prior domestic incident. A specific anonymous tip led investigators to the grave, and a gold 1999 Toyota Camry linked to King was found after another public tip. The case is part of a larger pattern of behavior under investigation, with authorities examining the nature of Scott and King’s relationship and whether others were involved. The medical examiner is determining the identity of the remains, and the city is supporting the family. The case underscores the importance of public tips and inter-agency cooperation in solving high-profile missing persons cases.
title: Police Investigating Disappearance of Philadelphia Woman Say Tip Led to Shallow Grave with Human Remains
